      • getAffectedProjects

        public static java.util.Set<IProject> getAffectedProjects(IProject project,
                                                          java.util.Set<IProject> relevantProjects)
        Get affected projects. At this point, this function returns projects which directly or indirectly reference the project containing the model element.
        Parameters:
        project -
        relevantProjects -
        Returns:
        relevantProjects

      • getProjectOrThrow

        public static IProject getProjectOrThrow(Resource resource)
        Retrieves the project that contains the resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - is the EMF resource for which to return the project.
        Returns:
        the project. Throws an exception if unable to retrieve the project.

      • getProject

        public static java.util.Optional<IProject> getProject(URI uri)
        Retrieves the project based on an EMF URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - is the URI for the EMF element for which to return the project.
        Returns:
        an optional containing a project based on the URI. The optional will be empty if the project cannot be retrieved.

      • getProjectOrNull

        public static IProject getProjectOrNull(URI elementUri)
        Retrieves the project based on an EMF URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - is the URI for the EMF element for which to return the project.
        Returns:
        the project. Returns null if the project cannot be returned.

      • getProjectForBoOrThrow

        public static IProject getProjectForBoOrThrow(java.lang.Object bo)
        Retrieves the project that contains the resource in which the business object is contained.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the project. Throws an exception if unable to retrieve the project.

      • getProjectForBo

        public static java.util.Optional<IProject> getProjectForBo(java.lang.Object bo)
        Retrieves the project that contains the resource in which the business object is contained.
        Parameters:
        bo - is the business for which to retrieve the project.
        Returns:
        an optional describing the project. An empty optional is returned if the project cannot be trieved.
